name: The Apple Equation
description:
This small game is part of the course "Game a Week". As the name suggests I made this in a week. The provided topic was "Physics".

Help the Apple hit that damn Newton!

Made by: Benjamin Rose

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game a Week"  (WinterSemester 2019/20)
